Welcome to Save what really interests you Save articles,videos or any online content you like.Add them to Pocket and read them when you have time. Your quiet corner of the internet Pocket saves articles in a clean layout designed for reading-no interruptions, no popups-so you can sidestep the internet\'s noise. Reduce eye strain with dark mode Want to dim the lights? Don\'t let a bright screen mess with your eyes or sleep.Turn on dark mode and continue your reading. Create account Log in
Your list is empty It\'s easy to add items to Pocket.Use the share button of any browser and tap on the Pocket icon to add an item Item Deleted Undo
